content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, as you know, I am a greedy and petty landlord. Let's focus on the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center close to all important facilities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a fair price. What's the lowest you would consider for a monthly rent?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a greedy landlord, I want to get the highest price possible. I won't settle for a low price just because you're a student. How about 2000 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a high price for a student like me. I'd be willing to pay 1000 euros per month, considering the location and the amenities. Is that something we can discuss further?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1000 euros is far too low for this apartment. I'm looking for a higher price to meet my greedy demands.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. Would you be willing to consider a price in the middle, say 1500 euros per month? It's a fair compromise considering the value of the apartment and my student budget.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1500 euros is still too low for this apartment. I'm looking for a higher price to meet my greedy demands.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your time, but I think we're at an impasse. I'm looking for a price that reflects my budget as a student, and you're looking for a price that meets your demands as a landlord. If you're not willing to consider 1500 euros, I don't see a point in continuing the negotiation. I'll have to look for other options. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
